analysis.key_quote: The Civil Service was established to counter corruption rampant at the time and foreseeable in the future. It must remain apolitical so employees can work for the government, using their skills and intelligence to do research and management of programs in an efficient method.
analysis.rationale: The comment emphasizes the importance of an apolitical civil service and the need for employees to work without political interference, which aligns with concerns about politicization and supports the merit-based system.
